characteristics.name: Capacity
characteristics.value: The Sokar Pattern Stormbird can transport 50 <CHAPTER> INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK or TERMINATOR model takes the space of two other INFANTRY models and each CENTURION takes the space of three other INFANTRY models. It may also transport <CHAPTER> BIKER models who take up the place of three INFANTRY models each. The Sokar Pattern Stormbird may also transport a single <CHAPTER> RHINO, including its own transported models, occupying 25 models' worth of space. When disembarking, the Rhino may only exit via dhe rear of the Sokar Pattern Stormbird.
